Key Match Events: Jonny Bairstow fell for a first-ball duck
Root fell after an eventful 17-ball stay
Malan and Stokes revived England’s chase with an 84-run stand
Stokes swept Zampa to Stoinis at fine leg
Post-Match Reflections: Buttler said after the side’s premature exit from the 10-team tournament, 'It certainly feels like a low point, To be stood in this position, having arrived in India with high hopes is incredibly tough and disappointing. It hurts a lot.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia posted 286 all out, while England managed 253 in reply
Australia are third in the standings after their fifth win in seven matches
Earlier, Chris Woakes (4-54) rattled Australia, removing both the openers inside six overs
Others: The match was played at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, India, on November 4, 2023
